Uses of Class
oracle.kubernetes.operator.http.HttpClient

  • Packages that use HttpClient 
    Package Description
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.http
    An HTTP client that is used when making REST calls to WebLogic Administration Servers.

    • Uses of HttpClient in oracle.kubernetes.operator.http

      Methods in oracle.kubernetes.operator.http that return HttpClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HttpClient HttpClient.createAuthenticatedClient(byte[] username, byte[] password)
      Create authenticated HTTP client.
      static HttpClient HttpClient.createAuthenticatedClientForServer(String namespace, String adminSecretName)
      Create authenticated client specifically targeted at an admin server.
